biotools.summary:
Phylogeny inference under the general Markov model using MST-backbone.

Phylogeny inference via maximum likelihood is NP-hard. Current methods make simplifying assumptions such as stationarity, homogeneity, and time-reversibility for computational ease. The stationarity assumption is violated by empirical observations of GC content evolution, and might systematically bias phylogeny inference.

bioschemas.name: MST-backbone-GM
